testimonials.text: Xiuming, Thank you for all that you've contributed to our team over the past several months.  Your hard work and dedication have been greatly appreciated.  It was also fun to get to know you outside of work!  You will be missed but we'll be sure to stay in touch.
testimonials.user: Cory Weech (Vice President, IT Security and Infrastructure @ Four Seasons)

testimonials.text: Hi Xiuming, glad to the opportunity to spend the pass few months working with you and learned a lot from you at the personal level as well.
testimonials.user: Tak Wan (Manager, Application Support @ Four Seasons)

testimonials.text: Xiuming (Professor X)!  It was so great to have worked with you and thanks for putting up with me üòÅ.
